Title: Stand Your Ground
Writer: Craig Johnson (based upon the "Walt Longmire Mysteries" book series by), Hunt Baldwin (developed for television by), John Coveny (developed for television by), Sheri Holman
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Cassidy Freeman
Plot: Walt looks deeper into the Irish mob. Henry finds the book he needs, while Cady gets legal advice. Malachi and Jacob lob accusations at each other.
